metadata.name: Chmod Suspicious Directory
metadata.comment: Detects chmod targeting files in abnormal directory paths.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/chmod')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/tmp/')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/.library/')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/etc/')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/opt/'))))

output.summary: Detects chmod targeting files in abnormal directory paths.

metadata.objective: False positive: Admin changing file permissions. References: https://www.intezer.com/blog/malware-analysis/new-backdoor-sysjoker/, https://github.com/redcanaryco/atomic-red-team/blob/f339e7da7d05f6057fdfcdd3742bfcf365fee2a9/atomics/T1222.002/T1222.002.md
